v2.3.1 - Changelog
Changed --- - Made the entire process of Combat Mode and general navigation faster than before by reorganizing code. - Adjusted range of randomized area of tap location.
Fixes --- - Fixed bug where targetting enemies was not accurate on screen. - Fixed several bugs where farming Raids would eventually get the bot stuck. - Fixed bug where bot crashed due to Kord being rate-limited. - Fixed bug where image scales for supported tablets were changed accidentally.
